response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its worth to both parties, we propose a selling price of $1,250,000. We understand that this might be a significant investment, but we assure you that it is a worthy one. Should you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1250000}
